alert.note: Alert for Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 22 at 1:56PM EDT until June 22 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL SUSSEX COUNTY... At 155 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Jarratt, or 12 miles northeast of Emporia, moving north at 15 mph. This storm has exhibited weak rotation and a rotating wall cloud was reported southeast of Jarratt. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Sussex around 235 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Yale, Gray and Hilda. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
